search.query: index=$ASM_INDEX$ sourcetype=asm:assets | stats latest('app_updates.domaininfo') as domaininfo latest('app_updates.ipgeo') as ipgeo latest('app_updates.own_body') as own_body latest('app_updates.own_header') as own_header latest('app_updates.ports') as ports latest('app_updates.rbls') as rbls latest('app_updates.screenshot') as screenshot latest('app_updates.ssl') as ssl latest('app_updates.wtech') as wtech | transpose header_field=field column_name=component | rename "row 1" as last_update | sort component
